https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/i2iReErbdXZ854ChqvkIXSWmuZ9.jpg In desperate need of extra high school credits, Jessie agrees to tutor young Tommy Faber, but when the timid 14-year-old insists he hasn't left Veronica's mansion in more than half a century, Jessie knows that something's amiss.
